p:
In the District Court April Term A.D. 1885 at Cheney W.T. Territory of Washington County of Spokane}ss In the District Court of Washington Territory, and for the Fourth Judicial District thereof, holding terms at Cheney, Spokane County, for Spokane, Lincoln, and Douglass Counties. April Term A.D. 1885 The Territory of Washington vs. Sterling P. White} Indictment for Murder in the Second Degree convicted of manslaughter sentenced to hard labor in Penitentiary at Beates, for a period of two years.
Cost Bill
